com.magicbinder.data.base

Class MagicBinderSQLiteOpenHelperBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.magicbinder.data.base.MagicBinderSQLiteOpenHelperBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MagicBinderSQLiteOpenHelper

    public class MagicBinderSQLiteOpenHelperBase
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class makes it easy for ContentProvider implementations to defer
    opening and upgrading the database until first use, to avoid blocking
    application startup with long-running database upgrades.
    See Also:
    SQLiteOpenHelper
